website_summaries.verdict: A great product for a short-term cleanse, if you can stomach 4 pills a day.
pros: Great for helping to restore balance to your gut bacteria and promoting regular bowel movements and better nutrient absorption

customer_reviews.title: Germanium has been cut from ingredient list
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t waste your money. I’ve been a loyal Oxy-Powder customer for 11 years. It’s NOT THE SAME PRODUCT THAT IT USED TO BE. They took out the key ingredient that made this product THE most superior and effective intestinal cleanser on the market, GERMANIUM. Now you might as well purchase Milk of Magnesia, you’ll get better results. Cannot believe they’re charging the same damn price after they took out Germanium. Extremely INEFFECTIVE product now. I will be a customer again if and when they add Germanium back to the ingredient list. Such a shame, this used to be an incredible product.
customer_reviews.author: Toquiña

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is insane and it works amazing. I take 3 capsules before bed and I feel like I lose 10% of my body weight the next day haha no cramps and no emergency poops.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: You can find it cheaper online.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely does work! I used it according to the directions on the back and not only did I lose weight but most of it was from my belly which was great! No cramping or any other bad side effects, just liquid poop. The only reason I rated it three stars in because I did find it online for half the price I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: When I opened the bottle and counted the capsules, ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the bottle and counted the capsules, there were only 19 capsules in. It happened with another bottle too. You need to check with your manufacturer .... it messes up my detox!
customer_reviews.author: Liana Sage

customer_reviews.title: Greatest cleansing product I ever tried...and I've tried alot. Ha
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I didn't but it to lose weight but in about 4 days of taking it I lost over 5lbs and about 3" off my waist. I'm not bloated. It doesn't give you cramps. It just moves all the crap out of your body when you wake up. This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that works!
customer_reviews.text: As a cancer patient, one of the side affects is severe constipation. I have taken everything from prescription drugs to over the counter meds for relief. Nothing worked until I took Oxy-Powder. I told my doctors and nurses and they are now suggesting it to their other patients. I've even given a couple of bottles to my "chemo buddies." I would just like to add that the suggested dose of 4 pills at night is more than enough. After experimenting, I settled on ONE pill in the morning. Usually that does the trick. If not, I will take a second a couple of hours later. I never need more than two. Thank you for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: sharpie

customer_reviews.title: Do not use the product!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this to anyone. I was wanting to go a cleanse not having to live in the bathroom for three days. This caused major cramping even when used as directed. Even with the recommended usage it was an extra 4 days for my bowels to calm down and be back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Green

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: This product just created incredibly loose stools. You can buy yourself a bottle of MCT oil for this price of this over priced product and achieve the same results. I really wanted to like this formula but I just did not. I also ready that they had changed the original formula and that the new formula, which is the one I used, works no where near as well as the original. Its a real bummer when stuff that works gets changed. I would suggest instead, a product called " the Lower bowel formula " by Dr John Christopher.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Tampered seal
customer_reviews.text: Usually love this company but this bottle came with too torn off will not feel safe to take as it looks tampered Unfortunately can’t return
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me. May work for you!
customer_reviews.text: I took this product as described and did not feel any effects. There was supposed to be the aid in elimination and cleansing-type effect from this product and it was just not felt. I by no means believe that this product is incapable of working for others, however my own experience was not worth it. Best of luck to any others!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very Gentle Intestinal Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, natural laxative. Very gentle, but works like magic. I would start slow with the capsules. Trying one at first in, in a 12-24 hour period, with lots of water and see how it works for you. For me, 1-2 a day work very well. We use also with pre-teen child, just one capsule occasionally in water. Much better alternative to suppositories for a kid. I've also used other products from this company (GHC) and been happy with them as well...
customer_reviews.author: Hip Momma

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is that it makes it so comfortable for you to go no cramps, no bloating, no painful gas just an easy process, I took it the night before and by morning time I felt the urge to just go and then maybe one or two more times during the day
customer_reviews.author: CocoJ

customer_reviews.title: If you're ever constipated, take these!
customer_reviews.text: All i'm going to say is... if you're ever constipated, take these! If you take opioid medication and have constipation issues, GET THIS! This is the ONLY laxative I will ever use again. Absolutely NO cramps EVER but it'll definitely clean ya out! Oh and make sure that you ONLY take it at BEDTIME!!!! Or you may not get any sleep cuz you'll be poopin all night, lol ;)
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mayer

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for gut issues!
customer_reviews.text: I run a practice that supports individuals to restore digestive function. This product is my #1 seller and #1 product to support healing and detoxification of the gut. If you are in need of digestive support and guidance, feel free to reach out to me.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I totally believed all the great reviews. However I don't know how they could give a good review because this does not work! I took 4 as directed and the next day, Nothing happened. Not even 1 bowel movement! So I took 6, 2 more as directed. Oh and did i mention. I drank 10-8 oz. Glasses of water and 2nd day still no bowel movement! Wow! And i really needed this to work. I usually do herbal colon cleanse every 6 weeks and that works. So i am sending this back and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Debie L. Bodjanac

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a person who has suffered from constipation my whole life, I've tried everything from prescribed meds to over the counter and home remedies, and nothing works. I thought I would give this a try since the price is reasonable and the reviews are good. I've had more bowel movements in the past five days than I do in an entire month. I can't say that it will completely clean you out, as I don't think it did for me, (why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5) but if you're a person suffering from constipation such as myself it does work, by providing you relief.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Flores

customer_reviews.title: this really works
customer_reviews.text: the first night (Friday) i took 3, even though it says to take 4-5 capsules. the next morning (Saturday) it worked i was in the restroom about 2 times. i believe the more water you drink the more it works. the next night (Saturday) i took 2 and it worked again. Sunday night i didn't take any and I'm still having regularity (Monday). i really like this product i will be buying more. thank you
customer_reviews.author: shannon Peters

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: The recommended dosage is 4 capsules but my wife and I had to take at least 6 to 8 in order to make the magic happen! It's not rough on your system but your stomach will speak in tongues to let you know something is going on with your pipes. You won't find yourself sprinting to the bathroom which is a good thing but I would definitely hold off on beaches, catwalks, road trips, restaurants........heck, just stay home until it has run its course!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Repeated second day and had better bowel movement and stomach feels clean and reduced bloating ...
customer_reviews.text: Took two capsules to start. Had bowel movement first day. Repeated second day and had better bowel movement and stomach feels clean and reduced bloating (which was a primary concern). Looking forward to continuing!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Does wonders!
customer_reviews.text: This is way better and a safer solution compared to Enemas! You don’t need to take it every once in a while just to get it out. If you are dealing with constant constipation. Try take a capsule or after dinner and see if your bowels move if not try take 2-3 etc until bowels move. I only need 1 every night and I go to the bathroom next morning. If I don’t take 1 I usually don’t have a bowel movement. Constipation is extremely bad for the body and this product by far works the best!!!!! I take it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Kaan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does not work. Took up to triple the recommended amount and made no difference in bowel movements. Obviously they changed their formula. Do not buy. Better results drinking Tart Cherry juice. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Weird side effects
customer_reviews.text: I am skeptical at taking more than one pill at a time, so I started with ONE of these last night. Even though I was exhausted before taking it, I had a hard time falling asleep for almost two hours. I felt very anxious. My brain felt kinda off, if that makes sense. I could feel random twitches and pains in my stomach and chest. I had 3 bowel movements today, though. So that was nice, but not worth the non-sleep, anxious and weird feelings that came with it. I'm also very grateful I did not take more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. If your irregular like myself. Global healing has the stuff for u. What i love about it is it doesnt make u go it helps u to go. The first time i took it, I could feel a build up inside of me. Like as if it was gathering all the waste. Every morning i had a movement. Then after a while i stopped taking it because i felt like i didnt need it and i was going without it for about 2weeks. I suggest that you stay on a healthy diet with this product because i do believe that it can regulate your movements. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey jordan

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanse out there
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I’m on treatment for bad Candida with strict diet and anti fungals. But one thing I notice that if you on any anti diarrhea med it will not work as it should be. Cause I was taking S. Boulardii which is yeast probiotic I was taking to kill the Candida which it’s also a anti diarrhea. So I took break from S. Boulardii for couple weeks and then I used oxy power on empty stomach wow it worked I mean it cleaned me out. For me at least that was the case.
customer_reviews.author: Said Hassan

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works so well!
customer_reviews.text: I love oxy-powder capsules. I’ve taken another product very similar to oxy-powder but have found that these are a bit more powerful which is great! I struggle with hypothyroidism and constipation is a common side effect. These capsules keep me functioning optimally. Very little cramping if any, while I sleep until I get up in the morning. Regular bowel movement occurs upon awakening or after the first cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: katherine neumann

customer_reviews.title: made me very very sick
customer_reviews.text: I threw up all day long!! and i did it again and it happened again...
customer_reviews.author: haluxy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good staff.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good staff. Not a good product, no promised result. Mag 07 works MUCH BETTER & CHEAPER!!!
customer_reviews.author: rimma r.

customer_reviews.title: Mold issues...
customer_reviews.text: I generally really like global healing center. It’s a good, solid supplement company. Unfortunately these made me react. I called the company and their citric acid is grown using a kind of mold/yeast. As someone with a severe mold allergy, it makes sense that I’d react! If you don’t have mold issues, I’m sure it’s a great product, just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff. I've had Crohn's disease for 40 years and unfortunately things now get stuck, really stuck...like 'go to the ER stuck'. Nothing else works except this product. It doesn't make you feel like you want to die either. It just makes things move on out! Way better than the surgery the doctor recommends!
customer_reviews.author: Campster24

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I discovered this product! It works like magic! I take four pills once a week, usually on Saturdays when I know, I'll be at home the next day. It works like magic! I would recommend it to anyone who wants to get rid of all the 'stuff' from the nooks & crannies of the stomach!
customer_reviews.author: Aniruddha

customer_reviews.title: IBS-C User
customer_reviews.text: So I have IBS-C and by body relies on a good cleanse every now and then. Unfortunately this product missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: That fact that it really works I use this when I go too long without doing the number 2 and this product cleans you out really well once you purge there are no lasting side effects I've used this product before. The only thing MAKE SURE THAT YOU USE AS DIRECTED AND MAKE SURE SURE SURE REALLY REALLY SURE THAT YOU HAVE NOTHING TO DO AFTER YOU TAKE IT YOULL NEED TO BE CLOSE REALLY REALLY CLOSE TO THE TOILET!!!! The best part is that it doesnt sneak up on you you'll get fair warning...
customer_reviews.author: dale m. salters

customer_reviews.title: From what I have read about most over the counter stool softeners, I feel this is a safe choice.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate the flavor nor the comfort since I baught this for my daughter. One of her physicians recommended it. It has helped her bowels to move. After following the dosing recommendation on the label, I found that we had to increase a couple of times b/f she got results, but once we did I tried keeping her at that level as per instructions, however it was too much. We had to back down to two capsules for the rest of the time. From what I have read about most over the counter stool softeners, I feel this Is a safe choice!
customer_reviews.author: J Garzarek

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operator!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had stomach problems all my life and have taken magnesium in one form or another for about 12 years. I love that this magnesium is seemingly more gentle than the others I’ve tried. No cramping, just smooth movements! A word of advice, though. Start with 1, do not start with 4, unless you want to liquify your insides and camp out in the bathroom for a while. If you’re very constipated you can take more if 1 doesn’t do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Neundorfer

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions.
customer_reviews.text: Im not going to mince words. I took five capsules on an empty tank right before bed. I woke up (in a fully alert sense) seven hours later. No cramping. No pain. No discomfort. Just gallons and gallons of poopy. Just oh my goodness. I was 180 lbs last night. This morning I am 169.4 after my time on the throne. 5/5 will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: raverprince

customer_reviews.title: This product isn’t full of sh!t.... but you probably are if you’re considering to buy this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I think this product works so well you’ll keep pooing the same a couple of weeks after stopping. Don’t chug water it runs right through ya. I did lose about 10 lbs fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over rated.
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with constipation for several weeks and thought I'd try these. Took them for a week as directed and didn't notice any difference. They may work for others, but didn't do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pawlicki

customer_reviews.title: Strong stuff
customer_reviews.text: This oxy-powder intestinal cleanser is VERY effective. I know I can count on it when I need it. I do get a little nauseated after taking it but I do it before bedtime on an empty stomach and I’m better by morning. Water is absolutely key to this stuff working the way it should. Don’t make any plans to be far from a bathroom until you’re used to how it works on your body, no accidents will happen but there will be a sense of urgency. The only downfall is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randomhero

customer_reviews.title: Will make you 💩
customer_reviews.text: It works amazing. You will 💩 your brains out and the more you take it you will 💩 a little less but not to noticeably. You will feel way better through out the day. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These cleansing pills really work. The first time I took them my system didn't respond. So I took another dose the next day as per directions and within 1 hour I was cleansed. I feel much better. I will definitely reorder as these are good to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane A.

customer_reviews.title: Extreme stomach cramps.
customer_reviews.text: Took the recommended dose of 4 pills at 9pm. At 1am was woken with extreme stomach pain that left it hard to breathe and feeling like I was gonna throw up. That was followed with bathroom explosion. Then the next morning several more (almost accidents) explosions. But those were without pain. No wonder people say they lose weight. It’s like an enema
customer_reviews.author: Powell

customer_reviews.title: No cramps!
customer_reviews.text: After extensively researching this product. I am SO glad that I did. I am on day 3. I took the recommended 4 capsules at night. I am 29, 140lb Asian female- who poops every 5 days. I have never been regular and suffer from serious constipation. I am feeling less bloated and I feel like I have more energy. I do not have that post-meal tiredness. The first day was the worst- I felt really foggy and had a headache. Took pills at night as directed. Did not suffer from any stomach cramps. I did successfully have 3-5 BM a day, mostly in the morning. Will definitely repurchase! Even got my husband to try!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an effective product at a much lesser amt. than the company recommends! I found that ONE capsule per day was sufficient to relieve the constipation that I experienced as a side effect from a diet pill I was taking--may be different for others but I would recommend starting with one pill and then adding more SLOWLY!
customer_reviews.author: Dietwise

customer_reviews.title: They do work somewhat but you have to take too many.
customer_reviews.text: I think these made a great source of magnesium, since they kept my blood pressure down a bit when I used them. That it one of the many benefits of using magnesium. However, I could not achieve results as far as it being a colon cleanse goes. I think having to take 4 capsules just to achieve the results, is a bit too much. It might work for some, but for the price of these, I am going to stick to a different magnesium supplement and try a different colon cleanse supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with an expired best by date.
customer_reviews.text: I only used the product twice before realizing the best by date was expired. The date said best by 4/20 and I ordered it 7/20. Not Cool 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Waldemar Kowalczyk

customer_reviews.title: It is the BEST DETOX out there.
customer_reviews.text: This entire line I used when I ended my chemotherapy treatment after completed (4) of the recommended 6 treatment. By the four I was advised that I will be needing 18 more chemotherapy treatment in addition of radiation. I used the entire Global Detox System for colon, liver,(3)kidney, harmful organism, toxic metal and intestine. All their products Oxy-Powder, Latero Flora, Livatrex, Paratrex,Seotrex,Detox Foot Pads, Renaltrex and Green Body Cleanser. The very best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great cleanse booster to get you back in balance
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cleanse booster, i did take 6 the second day due to minimal effects then the release began regularly over the five day recommendation. This isn’t something to do daily it’s to help you get your body and nutrition in order I will refer it to others and it’s a good product
customer_reviews.author: samana

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Does exactly what it says on the tin ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Does exactly what it says on the tin. Side note, and not for everyone. I am a bigger guy 6ft4, 240lbs. 4 didnt work for me. I increased it to 5 a night, with a big glass of water. Smaller framed people may want to dial it back to 3. In the morning, Katie bar the door. Things are going again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Honaker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT  PRODUCT  . IT  WORKS
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT . USED THE OXY POWDER A FEW TIMES . I DO A LIVER GALLBLADDER CLEANSE AND MY NATURAL DOCTOR SUGGESTED THAT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO DO A COLON CLEANSE BEFORE AND AFTER THE LIVER GALLBLADDER CLEANSE BECAUSE IF YOU DO NOT DO A COLON CLEANSE HALF LIVER AND GALLSTONES WILL STAY IN THE COLON . SO I USED THE OXY POWDER A FEW TIME AND IS VERY EFFECTIVE , GENTLE SOMETIMES YOU HAVE TO INCREASE THE DOSE .HIGHLY SUGGEST
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic! Really helps and it creates a way more natural and gentler "move"
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t know!
customer_reviews.text: I actually can’t rate this product because it STILL hasn’t arrived. It was supposed to be here 2 days ago and I bought it to take on vacation. Well, I leave today and I’ll be leaving without it. I bought it on Landyn Hutchinson’s(living with Landyn) bc I always have stomach issues when I travel. Guess I’ll have to wait til October to find out if it’ll actually help me. I’m actually VERY upset that I pay for Prime, yet most things take 3-5 days to actually get here.
customer_reviews.author: ,Erica Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Effective - No Cramps
customer_reviews.text: Super effective - drink plenty of water when taking. No cramping
customer_reviews.author: beachj

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs these!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about these from a friend who is a physician and recommended them for travel abroad...they are fantastic! While you may need to hang near the bathroom for a bit, you feel SO GOOD afterwards....It is hard to explain, but you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bruin Gal

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Gross. Major cramping and it my period start again. Disgusting
customer_reviews.author: Melanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Better be near a toilet the first couple days
customer_reviews.text: Took 5 doses the first night...next day had no differnce... took 6 the next night..and then the next day the flood gates opened...first couple days you better go the first time you feel it...after that it's not that bad. Had more energy after 5 days of taking. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby scheppler

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: My mom has been swearing my this stuff for years, and after i found myself in a desperate jam I finally decided to try it! I took 4 pills the first time, felt a little crampy, but was relieved after IT happened. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kr

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: No flavor so that is not really applicable. After 3 days of use I feel really cleaned put and much lighter!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I don’t. Suggest taking 9 pills. I felt my soul coming out of my body and into the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: What happened...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past and it was wonderful. It does exactly what it promises to do with ease. However, for some reason the order was marked via Amazon as undeliverable and cancelled. I am home due to CoVid 19. Not sure what the problem was. I am disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Morris

customer_reviews.title: It’ll get you going!
customer_reviews.text: For me it took a couple of days to get things moving and I needed the recommended amount. You’ll definitely need to be near a bathroom. I went about 4x a day. There was no flavor to them, which is good. I did however experience some stomach pains while taking these. I wouldn’t take them for constipation, but for a cleanse it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: they work as directed
customer_reviews.text: I started with 2, then 2nd day did 3 third day 4 along with tbl spoon apple cider vinegar a tbl spoon of maple syrup 16oz mineral water also each night. On the 4th day extremly pleased with this product i would recommend this to anyone who wants a great colon cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: leplemm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my sister who was suffering with terrible constipation. It has helped a lot. She still gets 2 or 3 a day. It great for digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: magic
customer_reviews.text: these pills are magic def do the job, ive been using these pills for about two years now I was getting them from a local health store but these are cheaper and they come pretty fast... the bottle say you should start off with 4 but I would say 5. The more you take the bigger the load from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Tried this a few night adding 2 capsules each time & nothing.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me. I tried it a few nights adding 2 capsules each time as the bottle says. For almost $30 I really wished this had worked. Sad to have lost $30 on a product that didn't deliver on its claim.
customer_reviews.author: LindsB

customer_reviews.title: 60 count bottle for 120 count price
customer_reviews.text: Slow your roll! This is a 60 count bottle for 120 count price. I made quick prchase and wasted 25 bucks. Kinda tricky if you ask me
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: best pills ever
customer_reviews.text: according to my doctors women going thru the change some their system causes them to have a terrible time to have a bowel movement so i had gone a week without going i tried everything. Then my step daughter told me about these pills and they really worked she had me take 5 to start within 2 hours i was going then 1 a day now i have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how it's described. Poo poo (ha!) to the nay sayers. I have to take meds every day for the rest of my life and they are hell on my system. This product works wonderfully to keep me regular.
customer_reviews.author: Doby-Elf

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that worked !
customer_reviews.text: Nothing would help medicine induced constipation like this . It is well worth the money and I started with four pills and got nothing the next day So i took 6 and it worked like a charm . From then on out I take 6 and I get great results. This honestly works to clean out my system .
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. I increased there dose as directed, still did not work. Felt terrible and bloated while taking this product. Would not recommend wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: wendy sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not as expected l.
customer_reviews.text: This is just powered magnesium citrate. Didn’t do anything the first day. Second day of doing it and taking two more like bottle says, did have movement. Very watery. As expected from using liquid magnesium citrate. Didn’t work as good as I expected, but it did “work” without cramping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be aware - works silently.
customer_reviews.text: It certainly has the 'power' to move things! Don't take it at bedtime if you don't want to be up most of the night. The best thing about it is that there was no pain; the worst thing about it was there was no warning of bowel movement. Showered a couple of times during the night.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great for those who are cursed with constipation issues. I have tried it all and even get regular colonics and this product works the best, and doesn’t have lasting effects or result in tummy ache.
customer_reviews.author: Kallan

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you are near the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review on Amazon. Oh boy, It works/ cleanse very well and you need to make sure you are close to the bathroom at all time ( prob over the weekend at home). Don’t take it during the week when you have to work or have to use/wait for office bathroom because you definitely would regret. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hydration is key
customer_reviews.text: Still my favorite cleanse! Hydrate well two days prior to taking. I would suggest taking 4 your first time (especially if you don’t “go” regularly) and drink plenty of water. I would say around a gallon each day you use this.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend. It works!. I took my first 4pills at night . It cleaned me out in the am. Drink plenty of lemon water . No painful stomach aches with this one
customer_reviews.author: Finalove15

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: I am not a dr . This is just my opinion and experience. I only used This product one time. I took the suggested 4 capsule dosage. It made me go to the bathroom. All morning. Beware of timing of it so you have access to bathroom. It has a slow release so I took it late in the evening around 10 pm . It worked to clean me out.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M Fioto Jr

customer_reviews.title: It worked but gives me side effects.
customer_reviews.text: It worked a couple of times, sometimes I had to take more than 4 for it to make me go once a day. Magnesium oxide has poor absorption, but at the same time I have absorption problems. I took it before bed, but when I was waking up in the morning my body was aching and my hands and feet are cold. Is not for me, but it could work for someone else. I am giving it 4 starts because it made me use the bathroom in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Kamaria

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you drink a lot of water to make the product work for you.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product once a month to help me have a clean health stomache life. It has been a product that I will continue to use as it help make sure I'm clean on the inside while I'm working on getting fit. The only thing you have to keep in mind is that if you have a lot of things to do the next day dont take it unless you have access to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: These work well but do take a few days. Beware on the 3rd or 4th day - stay close to the restroom! TMI, I know.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Works gently
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I found how about these through couple of my favorite Instagramers. . I have used them and it gently worked. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: brooke walsh

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing at cleansing your colon without cramping, bloating or discomfort. It REALLY cleans you out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This worked as advertised, I highly recommend if you need to empty your digestive tract. After cleaning things out I started on a probiotic, too soon to tell if it is working but I figured since I wasn't taking one what better time to do so.
customer_reviews.author: HoppyGuy

customer_reviews.title: This will clean you right out! It took more ...
customer_reviews.text: This will clean you right out! It took more than a day, and this stuff is potent. So I only took one dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Heagney

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: First I’d like to say I have ibs c, and have had for many years and a lot of products don’t work for me. This is one of them. Day one I took 4, day two I took 5, then days 3 and 4 I took 6 each day. 21 capsules total and nothing. Absolutely nothing at all. Not even a gurgle. It may work for you, I, however, am deeply disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works, but my body responded with diarrhea instead of several dumps a day.
customer_reviews.author: UntouchableShe

customer_reviews.title: Caution With the Dosage!
customer_reviews.text: Wow does this work!! Take according to your weight!! I took the recommended 4 and I was in too much pain! The next time I took 3 and it was much more bearable. Make no plans because you will be close to the bathroom for 12hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: A Must Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely works. I take 6 capsules in the morning and drink water throughout the day and within a few hours I’m on my way to the bathroom. It definitely cleans me out for two to three days. The capsules are thick and don’t have a flavor. I take them with food. I recommend while taking these capsules and thereafter to eat healthy foods or do juice cleanses.
customer_reviews.author: theo

customer_reviews.title: No cramps
customer_reviews.text: No taste, easy to swallow. It does make you go to the bathroom as mentioned on the label. I like it because it does not cramp your stomach. I have not seen any weight lost as mention from some reviews but I’ll continue to take product
customer_reviews.author: Demond Mccray

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Personally I would never buy these again. It just made me have diarrhea, I wouldn’t consider this a colon cleanse. I noticed I was also only sent 50 pills top. Over priced for what you get. You can just drink a cup of prune juice and have the same experience
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: THE Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: These. Work. Weighed 250 lbs on Apr 1st, started taking these once a week every week since and today 06/27 I am 218. Mind you I haven’t been eating really different nor working out. These definitely help clean out your system, once I start working out and actually eating 100% clean along with these I should drop another 20 lbs. Don’t hesitate, get em
customer_reviews.author: DBass

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gentle cleansing supplement
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take and very gentle. Far more gentle than I expected. I'm used to taking MagO7, but this formulation makes it safe to take during work weeknights. No worries about extreme urgency or heavy and forceful movements.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from constipation for many years!!! Honestly this product really helps when you are constipated. I aways take the recommended dosage at first and then scale it back once my constipation symptoms are relieved. I take it for about a week and then scale it back to one or two days a week. It is safe to take every day!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you this bottle have magic Pills The easy to swallow, no bad or good taste, They really work in the morning, My family buys bottles of this pills This is my second bottle. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for movement
customer_reviews.text: 20 pills not enough. First 2 nights I took 4 pills and ended up with soft stool. 3rd night nothing happened, so a waste of pills. 4th night I took 6 and watery movement. But than I ended up with 2 and well that did nothing. I’m actually on the toilet right now writing this review since I’m having a hard time going. Lol lost 1 lbs only. So everything still in there :/
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Oxy-Powder for several months. I have had problems with regularity because of some of the medications I take. I have found that 2 capsules most nights help me stay regular and cleansed with no urgency to go. My energy level seems to have increased. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not enough for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product, based on its great reviews. I think if I just has occasional constipation, it would be great. However, I have a lot of gut issues, and I didn't get great results from Oxy-Powder.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Burich

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel absolutely better
customer_reviews.text: I typically use this product when fasting I’m able to shed 2 to 3 more pounds than usual while taking this in a week
customer_reviews.author: leanna scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used these 3 days per week since purchase. I like that they seem to effectively clean out my system. I will continue to use this product. Customer service is good too! They quickly respond to my inquiry.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow works well
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well. On day 1, I took 4 capsules and didn't get the results I needed. Tried again on Day 2 with 5 capsules and the results were spot on with the directions listed on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Msnickig

customer_reviews.title: WORKS FOR ME!
customer_reviews.text: The only laxative that gently works on my sensitive bowels; giving me great relief. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: scattered

product_meta.title: Global Healing Center Oxy-Powder Oxygen Based Safe and Natural Colon Cleanser and Relief from Occasional Constipation (60 Capsules)
feature_bullets: CLEANSE, FLUSH, AND DETOXIFY YOUR COLON - Quickly detox your gut while you sleep. How EASY is that?
RELIEVES GAS AND OCCASIONAL CONSTIPATION - Helps to alleviate bloating and gas while supporting proper digestion.
HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Easy to take pills contain ozone-oxygenated magnesium and citric acid. The ingredients in Oxy-Powder are clinically proven safe and effective.
DESIGNED TO CLEAN ENTIRE DIGESTIVE TRACT - Oxidizes and reduces hard impacted fecal matter and is formulated to not harm natural flora in your gut.
SAFE & EFFECTIVE - Oxy-Powder uses oxygen for gentle cleansing of impurities and toxins. Does not require time off work or an interruption to your schedule!
